name: Kaze no Samouraï
description:
Kaze no Samourai is a game in developpement. A new version coming very soon.

The date will be communicated on this page.

Your brother has been kidnapped and you will save him with your sword.

Movement:

➡️To go to the right side.

⬅️To go to the left side.

⬇️Down.

⬆️Up.

Right click for attack.

And left click for ultimate.
